website_summaries.verdict: A great value with 3 locks that work well and can be "keyed" the same.
pros: A good choice for an office where a lot of people need access to the building and you face turnover
3 locks can work together with one app
cons: The locks are supposed to be weatherproof, but they can sometimes fail in rain

customer_reviews.title: Solid Product
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 3 of these and they arrived with one damaged lock assembly. Emailed the customer support and they sent me 2 replacement parts. Locks are all working great with no issues. The batteries that shipped with the product were mediocre at best, and shortly after install the locks displayed low battery. Easy fix and common to almost every product that ships with batteries. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Karl

customer_reviews.title: Good product software leaves something to be desired
customer_reviews.text: They work well once you have to setup. You can’t copy of users from lock to lock and the Bluetooth connection is very slow. It’s a nice product but the software needs some work.
customer_reviews.author: Marja S.

customer_reviews.title: A great product and a great service from Ultraloq
customer_reviews.text: The Ultraloq UL3 BT Bluetooth Enabled Fingerprint is a great product. You can add multiple users, either through your fingerprint or password, plus you can manage it through the Ultraloq app. I highly recommend them, no more lost keys and you also get a secure closure.
customer_reviews.author: Saul Wade Leon

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Have three now in my office
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Have three now in my office. Perfect for securing a premise with numerous employees and the risk of staff turnover. Since implementing, surrounding offices are impressed with the modern locks and technology and are eager to get their hands on them also.
customer_reviews.author: Michael G.

customer_reviews.title: These locks do everything they claim and are easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the three pack for my home office door, back door, and entry garage door. My whole family loves them! These locks do everything they claim and are easy to install. I had a problem with just one of the locksets when I was installing it. It was partially my own fault. I reached out to Ultraloq support and they quickly helped me, sending me a new lockset. I agreed to send them back the one I had. Excellent customer service! I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Locks work very well on a building complex. I am not sure how it's going to work in the winter.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Not the best.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased several of these. It’s works great if you only need one maybe two. Also purchased some other parts directly from the manufacturer...mistake. I still haven’t received a refund. The codes are only stored on each device, so when you add another lock, you have to add all the codes again. To be “WiFi” enabled you have to purchase the bridge for each lock.
customer_reviews.author: wjshad

customer_reviews.title: They are not controlled through a wifi or remotely
customer_reviews.text: I thought the blue tooth feature meant I could install myself and lock and unlock remotely. It is not possible. I returned this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 14

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I got the 3 pack set considering it will be reliable and I want to use the finger print so that I no need to cary any lock or mobile. With in just 8 months all the locks stopped working. For few days I managed to enter by trying 2 to 3 times. After that it completely dead. A very bad investment. This is the first product in my life time for which I am giving a 1 star. I still want to say I enjoyed this lock when it's working. First 2 to 3 months. Now I use my garrage door to enter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well, be careful with pre-drilled doors with deadbolt
customer_reviews.text: Lock is great and works well. Just be careful if installing on existing door with knob/deadbolt predrilled. The lock body covers half of the deadbolt hole on standard predrilled doors. I had to move lock to deadbolt position to install. Had a little work to make it fit/function, but it works.
customer_reviews.author: Joe D.

customer_reviews.title: Needs work
customer_reviews.text: Fingerprint scan is very flawed. Only able to register 1 out of 10 persons at best to use for access control. This capability was important to my buying decision, but it clearly needs refinement.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C Williams

customer_reviews.title: Love the keyless feature.
customer_reviews.text: We’ve purchased and installed three of this unit. I love the ease of not having to pull out my keys when my hands of full. This lock is a great asset to our property.
customer_reviews.author: Denise E.

customer_reviews.title: Didnt Get All 3 Locks in Pack...
customer_reviews.text: Only received 1 lock out 3 pack in a huge box. Have put the one lock in use yet and/installed so... But DONT KNOW WHERE THE REST OF MY LOCKS ARE AT! :[
customer_reviews.author: ERF

customer_reviews.title: working out the kinks
customer_reviews.text: when they work they are great, still having issues with a couple of my locks, not connecting to the app correctly, and one that goes through batteries like tic tacs
customer_reviews.author: lovetoread

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I've installed 2 in office bulding and the staffs like it. Have some wear and tear over the 6 mths but all been resolved by the support.
customer_reviews.author: DavidC

customer_reviews.title: The locks look nice & they're heavy & secure
customer_reviews.text: The locks look nice & they're heavy & secure. The fingerprint reader can be inconsistent, but the keypad & the backup key work well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Chaney

customer_reviews.title: happy
customer_reviews.text: ive purchased a few of these locks. well worth it to buy
customer_reviews.author: T.B.

product_meta.title: 3 Pack Ultraloq UL3 BT Bluetooth Enabled Fingerprint and Touchscreen Keyless Smart Door Lock (Aged Bronze)
feature_bullets: World's First 5-in-1 Keyless Entry Smart Lock, Fingerprint +User Code + Smartphone + Knock to Open + Key
Reversible lever, fits both left-handed and right-handed doors. DIY Installation
Competely waterproof and dustproof.Ideal for both indoor and outdoor installation. Single Latch (Optional Deadbolt Cover Plate Required for Replacing Existing Deadbolt)
Stores up to 95 Fingerprints and 95 Codes at a time, perfect for visitors and service personnel.
18 Months Electronic and Lifetime Mechanical Warranty.

specifications.Special Features: Auto Relock - Automatically relocks after 4 seconds; no need to remember to relock the door
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars32 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
